TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Jordan, title = Jordan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jordan} }

S.FORM: u Jordan sa i labu nu Asia, itiza i 31 00 N, 36 00 E u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 89,342 km2 u ahebal nu lalaay sa 88,802 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 540 km2 hamin nu tademaw sa 8,185,384. kakalukan umah sa 11.40%, kilakilangan umah sa 1.10%, zumaay henay umah sa 87.50% Jordan Ha-si-mu nu Hungtiay a kanatal, "A-la-pu a kamu" pangangan han tu Jordan itizaay i Si-Ya a Cung-tung a kanatal, ciniza nuwamisan micapi tu Syria , nuwalian micapi tu Yi-la-ke', nuwalian nutimulan micapi tu Sa-u-ti-ala-po, sapipan micapi tu Yi-se-lie atu Ba-le-sitan. Sihal itini i Jordan a satipanan lilis nu kanatal, Hong-hai i tiza i sazikuzay nu satipan nu timulan. lekakawaw a ngangayaw, Jordan itiza i Ou-ya fei Da-lu a salalikeluhan. kahenula a Tu-se An-man nu Jordan a kanatal u sakatuuday a tademaw nu Tu-se, nu cin-ci aca, cen-ce atu pulung nu lalangawan. tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Amman . kakininan nu kanatal demiad kakining nu kanatal demiad sa 25 bulad 5 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Abdullah II of Jordan, micakat a demiad sa i 1999 a mihca 2 bulad 7 demiad. cunli u cunli nu Jordan ayza sa ci Bisher Al-Khasawneh, micakat a demiad sa i 2020 a mihcaan 10 bulad 12 demiad. laylay kasumamadan nu Jordan namihcaan sadidiay ayaw nu 200,000 a mihcaan, Jordan izaw tu ku tademaw nazipaan nu muenengay. zayhan tizaay muenengay a tademaw namakay Fei-zhou pasayza i nu zumaan kakayzaan a zazan palahad, Jordan lalabu nu kanatal yadah ku nu malumanay nu ba'tuaynay a ziday "lae'd tu ayzaay pakala tu tusa a mang ku nisubelidan nazipaan. uynianay a mihcaan a tademaw amin i Bu-yaw a taku a tukus nisubelid tu niyungan nu heni tu dadikecan a nisubelida a nazipaan. mitesekay micekiway a tademaw i 14,500 a mihcaan laylay nu "Natufian" nisubelidan nazipaan a lalangawan maazih i kitkit nu kasumamada sabalakiay a men-paw, uyniay nisubeladan a nazipaan itini i nu ayzaay a Jordan nutimulan nuwamisan a likelikenan. baluhay nu ba'tuay a mihcaan tu "10,000-4,500BC" tademaw amin nau pahutinay miadipay mialaay misupeday maniyul pasayza i malukay a palahad. An-man nusawali tu "Ain Ghazal" uynianay a mihcaan naayawan nu lalay a niyazu' aca. tademaw amin i kasumamadan nisubelidan a nazipaan makutkut tahekal ku pinaay a sabaw cacay a bataan ku nu ba'tu apukay nisangaan tu tademaw, u heni i kasumamadan ayaw nu 7250 a mihcaan a nisangaan. ayzaay a Jordan saayawy nu kitakit a ngangayaw hawsa, Jordan u Ying-guo ku mikutay mikuwan tu Ko-ci-lin-mung . 1921 a mihcaan. Ying-guo i lilis nu Jordan a sauwac, i satipan u Balesitan han, nuwalian alikut u Jordan. Ying-guo i nuwalian patizang tu cacay a pangkiw tu nu uzipay nisakakuan a miading tu kanatal. patizeng tu Han-ce a Hungti sakatusa ni Hay-sen a wawa ci A-bo-du-la a Hungti likutay nu Jordan tumukay a kanatal tu tumuk nu niyazu'. 1946 a mihcaan lima a bulad tusa izaw ku lima a demiad, Jordan misateked tuway, ci A-bo-du-la mala Hungti tu "ci Ai-mi-er u tapang tu nu kanatal", u ngangan nu kanatal tu likutay a Jordan ci Ha-xi-mu a Hungti nu kanatal, 1948 a mihcaan maala nu Jordan ku Jordan a sauwac satipan a tukus nu Balesitan a kakitizaan. 1950 a mihcaan sepat a bulad, Jordan a sauwac satipan a tukus atu nuwalian a tukus papulung u Jordan Ha-xi-mu a Hungti a kanatal han, mahamin nuyzaanay nu satipan a tukus nu A-la-puo a tademaw mala Jordan a tademaw nu kanatal. . Jordan paaya tu Balesitan a tademaw, paculi tu Yiselie palekal tu kanatal. milihiza ciniza tu saayaway nu A-la-pu a kanatal mapulung pakay Yiselie a nganngayaw. i mazemec nu ngayaw ku kanatal nu a-La-pu hawsa, Jordan pakala tu sapikelec tu satipan a tukus. 1967 a mihcaan Jordan atu Ai-ji, Xi li-ya atu Yi-la-ke maladay mangangayaw. Yiselie maala tu ku Jordan a sawac tu satip a tukuh nu kakitizaan atu mahamin ku Ye-lu-sa-leng. zakiza nu ngangawaw Yi-se-lie misulul mialesay a Jordan a tademaw tayza tu i Ye-lu-sa-leng, mikuwan tu Sen-tin a buyu' tu Cin-cin a biw. sakatusa a ngangayawan, katuud ku nu A-la-puay milaliway a tademaw pasu Jordan a tademaw milaliw katukuh i Jordan a sauwac tu nuwalian a tukus,u Balesitan a tademaw i Jordan macunus tu ku icelang. Balesitan a tademaw macunustu, u Jordan Hungti a luma'an caay kalihalay. 1970 a mihcaan, i Balesitan u mihulakay a sakapu kinapina tu mialaw tu hikuki. Jordan malingatu tu palamal i tuhenian, uynian malilid tu ku hamin a kitakit nu A-la-pu . Xi-li-ya i Jordan nu nuwamisan lilis nu hekal, sanad tan-ke a hitay mipenec tu Jordan. 1970 a mihcaan siwa a bulad tusa izaw ku tusa a demiad, i Cairo nu A-la pu a kanatal u dayhiw nu kanatal a sakakaay a tatengilan tuni pasumad a misatezep, mahatatus mapadeng tu ku lamal. Naka zikuzan izaw tu ku adidi'au a nngangawawlald sa mapepel. Katukuh 1971 a mihcaan petu a bulad, Jordan a Balesitan sahulak a sakapu mabahbah tunu zumaan a kanatal. i 1973 a mihcaan tu pihulakan tu cumi a demaad tu ningangayawan, Jordan a lilisan nu kanatal nai' ku lamal nu ngangayaw. nika Jordan miculcul patahkal tu cacy a sakapu a hitay micumud tu Xi-li-ya, mitena' tu itizaay hitay nu Xi-li-ya. Jordan caay picumud tu 1991 a mihcaan tu Hay-wan a bgabgayaw. Cin-ci Jordan mahamin u kanatal caykataneng ku nanum, namahiza azau aca ku simalan nu tahak a kuang a tuudan, mahini sa u sata nu Cin-bu sakahenulan a kalisiw. An-man u kasaupuan nu paliwalay, A-kaba a minatu uyza dada' u sacumud a minatu, angangan a tuud miidatu nu i cuwacuwaay a nipacumun tu sapalawpes a tuudan, tabaku uepah, dingki a yungan a tuud atu kazizeng baket ku sata, baket ku sata a mapasatezep ku pisiwba. Jordan paymihcaan nipacumuda a kalisiw pakala nipatahkalan malabas tu tuluay tu a kalisaw. amidiput tu pakuyucay a binawlan, Jordan a cin-bu mipabeli tu sakauzip nu tademaw tu belac, walay, waneng, atu baketay simal nu kazizeng. 1991 . 1991 a mihcaan tu saayaway a Hai-wan a nganngayaw Jordan a cin-ci mangelu. Jordan mapacici pacenaen pasetezep tu sapanukas tu tadah. Jordan a kanatal katuud ku pakuyucay a tademaw nu Balesitan, nu zuma Haiwan a kanatal tupipadanng nu Jordan, tayzaay i nu zumaan a kanatal nu misakawaway a tademaw, u cin-ci nu Jordan budibut satu, kanatal mahamin u cin-ci caay ka tanektek a malawlaw. tademaw 77.71歲. Jordan a tademaw pakala tu 93% sa u A-la-po a tademaw , zuma a binacadan a tademaw pasu Gaojiasuo a tademaw , Si-la a tademaw , Ya-su a tademaw "pasu Ku-la-mi a iluc" . cunus nu tadema 2.89%. u mapatayay nu lutungay 1.961%. maydihan a tanaya' ku nikauzip tu 77.71 a mihcaan.

o Jordan sa i labo no Asia, itiza i 31 00 N, 36 00 E o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa 89,342 km2 o ahebal no lalaay sa 88,802 km2, o ahebal no nanomay sa 540 km2 hamin no tademaw sa 8,185,384. kakalokan omah sa 11.40%, kilakilangan omah sa 1.10%, zomaay henay omah sa 87.50% Jordan Ha-si-mo no Hongtiay a kanatal, "A-la-po a kamo" pangangan han to Jordan itizaay i Si-Ya a Cong-tong a kanatal, ciniza nowamisan micapi to Syria , nowalian micapi to Yi-la-ke', nowalian notimolan micapi to Sa-o-ti-ala-po, sapipan micapi to Yi-se-lie ato Ba-le-sitan. Sihal itini i Jordan a satipanan lilis no kanatal, Hong-hai i tiza i sazikozay no satipan no timolan. lekakawaw a ngangayaw, Jordan itiza i Oo-ya fei Da-lo a salalikelohan. kahenola a To-se An-man no Jordan a kanatal o sakatooday a tademaw no To-se, no cin-ci aca, cen-ce ato polong no lalangawan. tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o Amman . kakininan no kanatal demiad kakining no kanatal demiad sa 25 bolad 5 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) ayza sa ci Abdollah II of Jordan, micakat a demiad sa i 1999 a mihca 2 bolad 7 demiad. conli o conli no Jordan ayza sa ci Bisher Al-Khasawneh, micakat a demiad sa i 2020 a mihcaan 10 bolad 12 demiad. laylay kasomamadan no Jordan namihcaan sadidiay ayaw no 200,000 a mihcaan, Jordan izaw to ko tademaw nazipaan no moenengay. zayhan tizaay moenengay a tademaw namakay Fei-zhoo pasayza i no zomaan kakayzaan a zazan palahad, Jordan lalabo no kanatal yadah ko no malomanay no ba'toaynay a ziday "lae'd to ayzaay pakala to tosa a mang ko nisobelidan nazipaan. oynianay a mihcaan a tademaw amin i Bo-yaw a tako a tokos nisobelid to niyongan no heni to dadikecan a nisobelida a nazipaan. mitesekay micekiway a tademaw i 14,500 a mihcaan laylay no "Natofian" nisobelidan nazipaan a lalangawan maazih i kitkit no kasomamada sabalakiay a men-paw, oyniay nisobeladan a nazipaan itini i no ayzaay a Jordan notimolan nowamisan a likelikenan. balohay no ba'toay a mihcaan to "10,000-4,500BC" tademaw amin nao pahotinay miadipay mialaay misopeday maniyol pasayza i malokay a palahad. An-man nosawali to "Ain Ghazal" oynianay a mihcaan naayawan no lalay a niyazo' aca. tademaw amin i kasomamadan nisobelidan a nazipaan makotkot tahekal ko pinaay a sabaw cacay a bataan ko no ba'to apokay nisangaan to tademaw, o heni i kasomamadan ayaw no 7250 a mihcaan a nisangaan. ayzaay a Jordan saayawy no kitakit a ngangayaw hawsa, Jordan o Ying-goo ko mikotay mikowan to Ko-ci-lin-mong . 1921 a mihcaan. Ying-goo i lilis no Jordan a saowac, i satipan o Balesitan han, nowalian alikot o Jordan. Ying-goo i nowalian patizang to cacay a pangkiw to no ozipay nisakakoan a miading to kanatal. patizeng to Han-ce a Hongti sakatosa ni Hay-sen a wawa ci A-bo-do-la a Hongti likotay no Jordan tomokay a kanatal to tomok no niyazo'. 1946 a mihcaan lima a bolad tosa izaw ko lima a demiad, Jordan misateked toway, ci A-bo-do-la mala Hongti to "ci Ai-mi-er o tapang to no kanatal", o ngangan no kanatal to likotay a Jordan ci Ha-xi-mo a Hongti no kanatal, 1948 a mihcaan maala no Jordan ko Jordan a saowac satipan a tokos no Balesitan a kakitizaan. 1950 a mihcaan sepat a bolad, Jordan a saowac satipan a tokos ato nowalian a tokos papolong o Jordan Ha-xi-mo a Hongti a kanatal han, mahamin noyzaanay no satipan a tokos no A-la-poo a tademaw mala Jordan a tademaw no kanatal. . Jordan paaya to Balesitan a tademaw, pacoli to Yiselie palekal to kanatal. milihiza ciniza to saayaway no A-la-po a kanatal mapolong pakay Yiselie a nganngayaw. i mazemec no ngayaw ko kanatal no a-La-po hawsa, Jordan pakala to sapikelec to satipan a tokos. 1967 a mihcaan Jordan ato Ai-ji, Xi li-ya ato Yi-la-ke maladay mangangayaw. Yiselie maala to ko Jordan a sawac to satip a tokoh no kakitizaan ato mahamin ko Ye-lo-sa-leng. zakiza no ngangawaw Yi-se-lie misolol mialesay a Jordan a tademaw tayza to i Ye-lo-sa-leng, mikowan to Sen-tin a boyo' to Cin-cin a biw. sakatosa a ngangayawan, katood ko no A-la-poay milaliway a tademaw paso Jordan a tademaw milaliw katokoh i Jordan a saowac to nowalian a tokos,o Balesitan a tademaw i Jordan maconos to ko icelang. Balesitan a tademaw maconosto, o Jordan Hongti a loma'an caay kalihalay. 1970 a mihcaan, i Balesitan o miholakay a sakapo kinapina to mialaw to hikoki. Jordan malingato to palamal i tohenian, oynian malilid to ko hamin a kitakit no A-la-po . Xi-li-ya i Jordan no nowamisan lilis no hekal, sanad tan-ke a hitay mipenec to Jordan. 1970 a mihcaan siwa a bolad tosa izaw ko tosa a demiad, i Cairo no A-la po a kanatal o dayhiw no kanatal a sakakaay a tatengilan toni pasomad a misatezep, mahatatos mapadeng to ko lamal. Naka zikozan izaw to ko adidi'ao a nngangawawlald sa mapepel. Katokoh 1971 a mihcaan peto a bolad, Jordan a Balesitan saholak a sakapo mabahbah tono zomaan a kanatal. i 1973 a mihcaan to piholakan to comi a demaad to ningangayawan, Jordan a lilisan no kanatal nai' ko lamal no ngangayaw. nika Jordan micolcol patahkal to cacy a sakapo a hitay micomod to Xi-li-ya, mitena' to itizaay hitay no Xi-li-ya. Jordan caay picomod to 1991 a mihcaan to Hay-wan a bgabgayaw. Cin-ci Jordan mahamin o kanatal caykataneng ko nanom, namahiza azao aca ko simalan no tahak a koang a toodan, mahini sa o sata no Cin-bo sakahenolan a kalisiw. An-man o kasaopoan no paliwalay, A-kaba a minato oyza dada' o sacomod a minato, angangan a tood miidato no i cowacowaay a nipacomon to sapalawpes a toodan, tabako oepah, dingki a yongan a tood ato kazizeng baket ko sata, baket ko sata a mapasatezep ko pisiwba. Jordan paymihcaan nipacomoda a kalisiw pakala nipatahkalan malabas to toloay to a kalisaw. amidipot to pakoyocay a binawlan, Jordan a cin-bo mipabeli to sakaozip no tademaw to belac, walay, waneng, ato baketay simal no kazizeng. 1991 . 1991 a mihcaan to saayaway a Hai-wan a nganngayaw Jordan a cin-ci mangelo. Jordan mapacici pacenaen pasetezep to sapanokas to tadah. Jordan a kanatal katood ko pakoyocay a tademaw no Balesitan, no zoma Haiwan a kanatal topipadanng no Jordan, tayzaay i no zomaan a kanatal no misakawaway a tademaw, o cin-ci no Jordan bodibot sato, kanatal mahamin o cin-ci caay ka tanektek a malawlaw. tademaw 77.71歲. Jordan a tademaw pakala to 93% sa o A-la-po a tademaw , zoma a binacadan a tademaw paso Gaojiasoo a tademaw , Si-la a tademaw , Ya-so a tademaw "paso Ko-la-mi a iloc" . conos no tadema 2.89%. o mapatayay no lotongay 1.961%. maydihan a tanaya' ko nikaozip to 77.71 a mihcaan.
